title: Bilgewater event icons
body: Hey will you guys bring back the bilgewater event icons for Christmas? since all of the legacy skins are on the store so what about those legacy icons? because i would really like to obtain the gangplank and twisted fate icons. {{champion:41}} {{champion:4}}

replies.body: Typically the event icons don't come back around since they were intended to only be available during the course of the event. The items lose their uniqueness if you can still obtain them afterward.
So what's the harm of bringing back old events? Surely it was exclusive to the gangplank rework but why not make butchers bridge a playable map again?

There's no harm, it just hasn't come back around. There's also no guarantee that they will, as these events are meant to be a fun thing for people to take part in while they're happening. They stop being unique and fun, just like the icons, if they're available all the time.
